Sentencas: A deep understanding of underlying processes and possible challenges is required for the development of ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: In this context, a detailed 3D multiphysics model of an ammonia-fueled SOFC is developed in the current study.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: Anode off -gas recirculation and nickel nitriding as two of the main aspects of ammonia-fueled SOFCs are investigated in the current study.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: The developed model is validated with experimental data under various conditions including direct and pre-cracked ammonia cases for various flow rates at different temperatures (700-850 degrees C ) as well as different recirculation rates.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: A good agreement is achieved between the model results and the measurement indicating that the physics are well captured.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: Furthermore, nickel nitriding as one of the main challenges in the direct ammonia-fueled SOFCs is addressed and qualitatively validated with experimental data.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: The model can explain the reduction of performance difference between direct ammonia-fueled SOFC compared to its pre-cracked counterpart by reducing the fuel flow rate (increasing fuel utilization) and increasing the operating temperature.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: The highest performance difference (5.87%) is observed at 700 degrees C and fuel utilization of 14%, and the lowest difference (0.05%) belongs to 850 degrees C and fuel utilization of 70% at 0.5 A/cm 2 .
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: Anode off -gas recirculation is found to yield significant savings in ammonia fuel around 21-27% while a slight power reduction (0.34-0.88%) is observed by increasing the recirculation rate from 70 to 90% compared to the case without recirculation.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: Excessive amount of nitrogen in the high recirculation rates does not show a significant effect on the performance.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation

Sentencas: Nickel nitriding is reduced by increasing the temperature and fuel utilization.
Titulo: Detailed 3D multiphysics modeling of an ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell: Anode off-gas recirculation and Ni nitriding degradation
